00008 EagleLinkedList* EagleLinkedList_New(void)
00009 {
00010     EagleLinkedList *list = (EagleLinkedList*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLinkedList_New.1", sizeof(EagleLinkedList));
00011     if(NULL == list) {
00012         return NULL;
00013     }
00014     
00015     list->modifyLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00016     list->first = NULL;
00017     list->last = NULL;
00018     list->length = 0;
00019     
00020     return list;
00021 }

00023 void EagleLinkedList_add(EagleLinkedList *list, EagleLinkedListItem *item)
00024 {
00025     if(NULL == list) {
00026         return;
00027     }
00028     if(NULL == item) {
00029         return;
00030     }
00031     
00032     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00033     item->next = NULL;
00034     if(NULL == list->last) {
00035         list->last = list->first = item;
00036     }
00037     else {
00038         EagleLinkedListItem *current = list->last;
00039         current->next = item;
00040         current = current->next;
00041         list->last = current;
00042     }
00043     ++list->length;
00044     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00045 }

00048 {
00049     int length;
00050     
00051     if(NULL == list) {
00052         return 0;
00053     }
00054     
00055     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00056     length = list->length;
00057     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00058     
00059     return length;

00072 void EagleLinkedList_DeleteItems(EagleLinkedList *list)
00073 {
00074     if(NULL == list) {
00075         return;
00076     }
00077     if(EagleTrue == EagleLinkedList_isEmpty(list)) {
00078         return;
00079     }
00080     
00081     {
00082         EagleLinkedListItem *p, *next;
00083         EagleSynchronizer_Lock(list->modifyLock);
00084         
00085         for(p = list->first; NULL != p; p = next) {
00086             next = p->next;
00087             EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(p);
00088         }
00089         list->first = list->last = NULL;
00090         list->length = 0;
00091         
00092         EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);
00093     }
00094 }

00101

00137     first = list->first;
00138     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);

00142 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedList_end(EagleLinkedList *list)

00145

00147         return NULL;

00151     head = list->last;
00152     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(list->modifyLock);

00156 EagleLinkedListItem* EagleLinkedList_pop(EagleLinkedList *list)
00157 {
00158     EagleLinkedListItem *next, *r;
00159     int i;
00160     
00161     if(EagleLinkedList_length(list) == 0) {
00162         return NULL;
00163     }
00164     if(EagleLinkedList_length(list) == 1) {
00165         EagleLinkedListItem *item = list->first;
00166         list->first = list->last = NULL;
00167         --list->length;
00168         item->next = NULL;
00169         return item;
00170     }
00171     
00172     /* find the second last item */
00173     next = list->first;
00174     for(i = 0; i < list->length - 2; ++i) {
00175         next = next->next;
00176     }
00177     
00178     --list->length;
00179     list->last = next;
00180     next->next->next = NULL;
00181     r = next->next;
00182     list->last->next = NULL;
00183     return r;
00184 }

00186 EagleBoolean EagleLinkedList_isEmpty(EagleLinkedList *list)
00187 {

00189         return EagleTrue;
00190     }
00191     if(0 == list->length) {
00192         return EagleTrue;
00193     }
00194     return EagleFalse;
00195 }

00197 void** EagleLinkedList_toArray(EagleLinkedList *list, int *size)
00198 {
00199     void **array;
00200     EagleLinkedListItem *p, *next;
00201     int i;
00202     
00203     if(NULL == list) {
00204         return NULL;
00205     }
00206     
00207     *size = EagleLinkedList_length(list);
00208     array = (void**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleLinkedList_toArray.1", sizeof(void*), *size);
00209     
00210     for(p = list->first, i = 0; NULL != p; p = next, ++i) {
00211         array[i] = p->obj;
00212         next = p->next;
00213     }
00214     
00215     return array;
00216 }

00218 void* EagleLinkedList_get(EagleLinkedList *list, int index)
00219 {
00220     EagleLinkedListItem *next;
00221     int i;
00222     
00223     /* out of bounds */
00224     if(index < 0 || index >= EagleLinkedList_length(list)) {
00225         return NULL;
00226     }
00227     
00228     next = list->first;
00229     for(i = 0; i < index; ++i) {
00230         next = next->next;
00231     }
00232     
00233     return next->obj;
00234 }

00238     EagleLinkedList_add(list, EagleLinkedListItem_New(obj, freeObj, free));

00241 EagleBoolean EagleLinkedList_deleteObject(EagleLinkedList *list, void *obj)
00242 {
00243     EagleLinkedListItem *last, *cursor;
00244     
00245     /* problems */
00246     if(NULL == obj) {
00247         return EagleFalse;
00248     }
00249     if(EagleTrue == EagleLinkedList_isEmpty(list)) {
00250         return EagleFalse;
00251     }
00252     
00253     /* one item */
00254     if(EagleLinkedList_length(list) == 1) {
00255         if(list->first->obj == obj) {
00256             EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(list->first);
00257             list->length = 0;
00258             list->first = NULL;
00259             list->last = NULL;
00260             
00261             return EagleTrue;
00262         }
00263         return EagleFalse;
00264     }
00265     
00266     /* begin item */
00267     if(EagleLinkedList_begin(list)->obj == obj) {
00268         EagleLinkedListItem *second = list->first->next;
00269         
00270         EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(list->first);
00271         --list->length;
00272         list->first = second;
00273         
00274         return EagleTrue;
00275     }
00276     
00277     /* some item after the first */
00278     last = EagleLinkedList_begin(list);
00279     for(cursor = last->next; NULL != cursor; cursor = cursor->next, last = last->next) {
00280         if(obj == cursor->obj) {
00281             /* if this is the last item we need to fix the last pointer */
00282             if(list->last == cursor) {
00283                 list->last = last;
00284             }
00285             
00286             last->next = cursor->next;
00287             EagleLinkedListItem_Delete(cursor);
00288             --list->length;
00289             return EagleTrue;
00290         }
00291     }
00292     
00293     /* object not found on list */
00294     return EagleFalse;
00295 }
